en.name: traditional-croissant
en.title: Traditional Croissant
en.description: Flaky, buttery pastry with a tender, airy crumb. Made from our signature levain sourdough and crafted over a 48-hour fermentation
en.fullDescription: Flaky, buttery pastry with a tender, airy crumb. Made from our signature levain sourdough and crafted over a 48-hour fermentation, this croissant delivers a perfect balance of rich flavor and delicate texture. Delicious on its own or paired with your favorite spread.
